extendedInfo.description: Avoid falling raindrops!Babara's town is under severe storm. Protect Babara from catching a cold.â¢ You can save game when pressing your phone's Cancel key during game play.[How to play]â  BabaraYou may move right and left by sensor or touching screen. Control method can be switched in the Settings. Sensor is selected by default.â¡ Babara HPHP will decrease if Babara hit by raindrop or lightning. If Babara lose all HP, the game will be over.â¢ Raindrop â£ Acid Rain â¤ ThunderIf Babara is hit, HP will decrease and Babara will pass out for a few moments.â¥ Items[Sunlight] Everything will disappear from screen.[Medicine] Small amount of HP is restored.[Skateboard]Increase Babara's movement speed. It will disappear, if Babara hit by raindrop or lightning.[Umbrella]Protect Babara from raindrop and lightning.[Leaf]Enter 'Flower-Mode' that flowers are falling from the sky. Score goes up when Babara hits these flowers.â¦ Sunlight ButtonTouch this when Babara is in danger. Everything will disappear from screen. Once used, it requires time to recharge and the higher level is, the lesser charging time is required.â§ Recovery HeartAs you progress to higher level, the heart is slightly filled in each level. If the heart is filled up, Babara will be automatically recovered when catching a cold. There are up to three hearts to be filled.

reviews.comment: Cannot get her to move.Great game otherwise
